meanings.definition: The quality or condition of being universal.
meanings.sent1: The universality of love is seen in every culture.
meanings.sent2: The idea of universality in mathematics is fascinating.
meanings.sent3: The universality of laughter brings people together.
meanings.sent4: Her smile had a universality that brightened the room.
meanings.sent5: The universality of kindness knows no boundaries.

meanings.definition: The principle that something is applicable to all cases.
meanings.sent1: The universality of gravity applies to all objects.
meanings.sent2: Scientists strive to find universality in their theories.
meanings.sent3: The universality of traffic rules keeps us safe.
meanings.sent4: The universality of time reminds us of its constant flow.
meanings.sent5: The universality of music transcends language barriers.
